articles.title: Tractor protest sparks 'worst Dutch rush hour'
articles.description: There were some 1,100km (700 miles) of jams as farmers reacted to plans to cut nitrogen emissions.
articles.content:
Image copyrightEPA
Tractor-driving farmers taking to the streets to demand greater recognition have caused the worst ever Dutch morning rush hour on Tuesday, according to motoring organisation ANWB.
